name: Fisher Apollo Bullet Space Pen
description: Record important information regardless of temperature, precipitation, or greasy stuff on the paper. Useful for backcountry skiers, guides, and anyone needing to take notes while upside down or under water.Chrome metal case.Gel ink is sealed in a pressurized cartridge that won’t leak under pressure.Writes at any angle. Operates under water and (theoretically) at temperatures from -45 to 200°C.
